vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.24.7
§ Agag = "I will overtop"
king of Amalek, spared by Saul but slain by Samuel
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞甲 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我會在萬人之上"
亞瑪力人的王, 掃羅留存其性命, 但仍為撒母耳所殺
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚甲 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我会在万人之上"
亚玛力人的王, 扫罗留存其性命, 但仍为撒母耳所杀

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.15.8
Also named: a.ga.gi (אֲגָגִי "Agagite" H0091)
§ Agag = "I will overtop"
king of Amalek, spared by Saul but slain by Samuel
